name: Yolka (enotofil)
description:
You have to go on a journey for the Christmas tree armed with only spade. Blast your way through snow drifts, live snowmen and kamikaze rabbits. The spade can be used not only as a melee weapon, but also to clear paths and create cover during a snowfight. And please be careful with grenades!

Jam version with leaderboard is available at Yandex.Games:

https://yandex.com/games/play/179783
